entries.journal_entry_completion_summary: Using the Force crystal, you were able to heal some ailing plants at the Woolamander Temple and hopefully bring some peace to the troubled creatures that inhabit it.
entries.journal_entry_description: Luke is interested in the response of the woolamanders to the Force. He thinks their reaction is due to the Sith Lords who had previously been on Yavin IV, and the dark Force energy that pervades the moon. In an effort to honor the woolamanders and show that the force is not always used for darkness, Luke wants you to return to the Woolamander Temple and use the crystal to cure some infected plants there.
entries.task00_journal_entry_description: Return to the Woolamander Temple and cure some of the dying plants at the Temple's entrance.
